comments.body: What happens when it's already defined? Should we redefine? It looks like this silently ignores already defined columns, which may be unintuitive for users.

The redefinition or, more in general, bogus definition is handled by TLoopManager::AddColumnAlias: https://github.com/root-project/root/pull/1048/files#diff-600cca72f8a33c06aa6afa8f9fdfc4e4R481 
The case of redefinition of an alias to a different column is considered
